attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sirs,

We, as british subjects, demand the government of the day hold a general election at the earliest opportunity.

Prior to the previous General Election the government promised that the previous Prime Minister would serve a full Term.  That individual has now left office, thereby ending the term of that government and requiring that they fulfil their obligation to hold a General election at the end of that term.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
